entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
